title: How to forward my text messages to my husband's phone - Quora

response.answer_text: Just highlight Everything you want to forward to his phone when it's highlighted hit the forward button it will ask you for a name or phone number in the browser bar put his name or phone number in there and then hit send and he should get them. If you want to forward your entire conversation then just hit control A and everything will highlight you won't have to go and highlight one text at a time they will all highlight up that's the faster way if you're doing large volumes of conversation. Also can check At the phone store if he got a new phone maybe they could help him retrieve his text messages. I always get all of my text messages when I get a new phone. Hope that helped.

You can forward his messages to your phone, if you can get his phone or send his messages to your email. Also if you have access to his phone there is an app called messages for the web it will sync up with his phone, just scan the bar code. I hope this helps.
